A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I gave this movie one star. It deserves less\, but Flixter won't count it if you give it less. This is one of the worst movies ever made\, and the absolute worst Star Wars movie ever made. There is so much wrong with this movie that it would take pages and pages to even get close to explaining what was wrong. Visually beautiful with absolutely no substance.I wouldn't wish this movie on my worst enemy. The critics got this one wrong\, big time.
